Class BuildingPhaseLv2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.GamePhase
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.BuildingPhaseLv2
public class BuildingPhaseLv2 extends GamePhase
Represents the second level of the building phase in the game. In this phase, players can place, reserve, and remove ShipCards on their personal ShipBoard, in preparation for the upcoming adventure phase. This phase is time-constrained using a system of up to three 90-second timers. Once all players complete their construction or all timers expire, the game transitions to the CheckPhase. Responsibilities include:
  • Managing placement and reservation of ship components
  • Tracking which players have finished building
  • Handling the progression through timed building rounds

    • startNewTimer

      public void startNewTimer(String username)
      Starts the next 90-second timer in the phase, based on the current number of completed timers. After the third timer finishes, the game transitions to the CheckPhase.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player attempting to start the timer
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the timer is already running, or conditions are not met for starting the next one

    • endBuildingLevel2

      public void endBuildingLevel2(String username, int pos)
      Ends the building process for the specified player. If all players have finished, the phase automatically transitions to CheckPhase.
      Overrides:
      endBuildingLevel2 in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      pos - the position at which the player ends building
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the player has already ended building
